subject: Re: [junit] Plz can anybody help me ? by replying that is it possible to test a java script using junit test case
msgSnippet: Thanks a lots for the reply... Actually i am trying to swap it with html unit test in junitframe work for javascript function....but can u plz letme know the
messageBody:
Thanks a lots for the reply...
Actually i am trying to swap it with html unit test in junitframe
work for javascript function....but can u plz letme know the source
abt the html unit test , i mean the is there in testcase written by
html unit ...bcs no proper api also i am not able to get through
net....plz help me
Thanks and Regards
Sanjukta


On Thu, 17 Mar 2005 10:00:41 +1000, Paul King <paulk@...> wrote:
>
>
> Alex Zuroff wrote:
> >
> > Take a look at JsUnit - http://www.edwardh.com/jsunit/ - it's like
> > JUnit, but for JavaScript.
> >
> > sanjukta s wrote:
> >
> >>Hi all,
> >> I am trying to test my application with junit testing but in first
> >>page it self there is a submit button , and in body tag a javascript
> >>function is there so when ener i am tring to click the submit button
> >>it calls the java script and my results are failing....
> >>so plz any body let me know how to test these java script function
> >>through junit test cases..
> >>Thanks and Regards
> >>
>
> If you are using HttpUnit client library you could swap to HtmlUnit
> or try webtest. They handle JavaSrcipt better than HttpUnit.
>
> Paul.
